channel.title: Git on Eman's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Eman's Blog

item.title: Git Submodules
item.description: Delete a Submodule Open .gitmodules and remove the entry of the submodule to delete Sample entry to remove from .gitmodules [submodule "path/to/submodule/folder"] path = path/to/submodule/folder url = https://github.com/submodule/to_delete.git Stage the changes in .gitmodules git add .gitmodules Open .git/config and remove the entry of the submodule to delete Sample entry to remove from .git/config [submodule "path/to/submodule/folder"] url = https://github.com/submodule/to_delete.git active = true Delete submodule folder using git rm
